snippet: About 13 hours after the Knicks declined to match the Rockets’ offer sheet to Jeremy Lin, his merchandise at one sporting goods chain was heavily discounted.
abstract: Richard Sandomir Sports Business column notes that promptly after the New York Knicks let Jeremy Lin go to the Houston Rockets, his merchandise at one sporting goods chain was heavily discounted.
lead_paragraph: About 13 hours after the Knicks declined to match the Rockets’ offer sheet to Jeremy Lin, his merchandise at one sporting goods chain was heavily discounted.

headline.seo: Lin Is Gone, and So Is the Buzz
headline.main: Lin Is Gone, and So Is the Buzz
headline.print_headline: Lin Is Gone, And So Is the Buzz
